text:
Hey, does anybody else started having issues with oauth? The Install URL (OAuth) generated by HubSpot stopped working. Literally copypasting it from panel to the address bar ends with

"The redirect_uri does not match the client registered redirect_uri. Please contact the integrator."

Could please anybody confirm it's a HubSpot issue?

They are validating the redirect_uri and also the scopes etc.

Just make sure you browser didn't cache the redirect (HTTP 308), opening an anonymous window.

Hi there, I work within a publisher media company and we often send out HTML based emails on our clients behalf.  Oftentimes our clients have their own UTM parameters on the email.  I've noticed that their UTM parameters are being overwritten by a HubSpot one.  In our email settings I had it turned off to not overwrite someone elses UTM's. Can someone help me out with why this is happening? Thanks!
Yes, I know they do validation of scopes. Either way it stopped working and our clients report that. Unfortunately its not a browser issue
what is the query string to add at the end of URL to test removing jQuery from HubSpot?
